column2: YUM! My friend and I waited for about 30-45 min on a Sunday at about noon (it wasn't a problem because we weren't starving and knew we would work up an appetite. We ordered the omelette of the day which was fresh tomato
column3: green onion and tzatzki cream cheese
column4: it was delicious!!! We also ordered the Bulls eye French toast (highly recommend)
column5: major party flavor in my mouth! I wanted to order a goat milk latte but I chickened out last minute and ended up with a regular latte
column6: it was still delicious but it gives me a reason to go back and try the goat milk latte.
